dbpm:document_info.dbpm:text_selections:
1. Document Ingestion - User uploads one or more documents (text, PDF, or Word). - System stores documents and extracts textual content
2. Document Selection - User selects a document for analysis. - System displays document content and previously identified text segments.
3. Process Extraction - System analyzes selected document text. nked to pro ocess model from extracted information. - Process includes tasks, decisions, flows, and subprocesses. - Each model element is linked to its source document text.
5. Model Refinement - User reviews and e relationships. - System maintains traceability between model elements and document fragments.
6. Subprocess Linking - Subprocesses reference separate process models. - User can navigate between pare 8. Output - Finalized process models are exported. - Traceability between documents and processes is retained.
